name: Black Orb on Ladder
description:
Help The Black Orb to reach Portal to finish this game. Simple Platformer game but can you finish this game?

Note:

Still in Development. I am really apprecite if you give me some feedbacks for this game improvement.

Make sure to read the tutorial in HOW TO PLAY section in the game menu. I have made this game playable with keyboard and playable on mobile.
